name: @the-coin/broker-service
description: TheCoin simple broker services.  This sample API is an example of how to setup the simplest low-volume exchange, when combined with the included server code, without external dependencies

scripts.debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=development && yarn build && node --inspect index.js
scripts.build:copy: (if not exist build\api mkdir build\api) && copy Generated\api src\api && copy src\api build\api
